column2: This states the year of which the samples were taken. This ranges from 2006-2011
The treatment states the level of Organic treatment that the field has been subject to. This is a range of 1 (Cross-Compliance) to 3 (Extra ELS)
The name of the field in the region of the UK
The area in Hectares of the Field
The type of crop harvested from the field which is a variety of grains and cereals.
The amount of crop per hectare harvested.
The number of tonnes of crop per hectare harvested.
The ratio of crop harvested to tonne harvested per hectare.
